thread.title: Tim Moore CEO Urbansoft Storms DC
thread.title_full: Tim Moore CEO Urbansoft Storms DC | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Tim Moore CEO Urbansoft Storms DC
text:
(MENAFN Press) Tim Moore CEO Urbansoft Technologies Reception DC WASHINGTON - Oct. 11 2015 - PRLog -- Tim Moore is well known in the industry as a wearable technology lead and was one of the Google Glass developers. At this latest event in Washington DC Mr. Moore was the center of attention amonst many notables including computer security experts software developers in emerging technologies Charles ''Chuck'' Botwick President and CEO at CHB Infrastructure Technologies Tattiana Wright - International Business Consultant Thomas Johnson - Lobbyist Maya Johnson - International Finance and Richard Lewis - Technology Marketing Officer Augur Marketing LLC."Tim Moore is a true visionary; it takes just seconds to know he is from the future." - Huffington PostDr. Samuel Lee Hancock CEO and Producer at Emerald-Planet.org was also in attendance. His weekly show is broadcast globally and has a potential audience of 3 million viewers. There is a rumor that Mr. Moore may be a guest on the show to discuss some of his green technology and clean tech projects.https://flic.kr/s/aHskn29y8yMr. Moore has been asked to be a judge at the upcoming International Consumer Electronic (CES) show in Las Vegas. Tim is the new CEO of Urbansoft Technologies and is growing the company into the North American market.Peter Bohn Jr. Partner at Augur Marketing LLC had this to say. "It was our pleasure to manage this event on behalf of Urbansoft Technologies. We have been a customer of Urbansoft''s for years and it is an honor to work with them and Tim. We invited hundreds of local notables and had excellent feedback about the great networking and being able to have this kind of access to one of the top names in IT in the world."Augur Marketing a Washington DC based marketing firm was retained by Urbansoft Technologies a global software development company based in Bahrain to help grow it''s profile and service offerings in the United States.http://www.augurmarketing.comUrbansoft Technologies was founded in 2007 has 35 employees has a global client base in Asia and the Middle East and is in a growth stage in Dubai (UAE) Scandanavia along with expansion of the North American office to manage global operations. Urbansoft provides a full menu of services from complete web design full content management blogging and social media solutions custom designed software mobile and wearable applications.Augur Marketing LLC was founded in 2009 and provides the most effective combination of services including web design social media outreach search engine optimization (SEO) paid online advertising (SEM) direct marketing televison advertising placement and promotional videos to generate awareness and increase sales for clients.http://www.augurmarketing.comThe reception was held at STK Restaurant in Washington DC which is part of a nationwide chain. "STK is heating up the dynamic city of D.C. in its high-energy Dupont Circle neighborhood. By artfully blending the modern steakhouse and chic lounge into one STK offers a dynamic fine-dining experience for D.C.''s social and sophisticated crowd" ContactPeter Bohn***augurmarketing.com--- End ---
